meanings.definition: The act of authorizing something again.
meanings.sent1: The reauthorizations of the library cards allowed everyone to continue borrowing books.
meanings.sent2: The reauthorizations of the permits were completed smoothly without any delays.
meanings.sent3: The reauthorizations of the snack vending machine brought joy to the hungry students.
meanings.sent4: The reauthorizations of the security system were like giving it a fresh set of eyes to watch over the building.
meanings.sent5: The reauthorizations of the software licenses were crucial to ensure the programs continued to work properly.

meanings.definition: The process of renewing authorization for something.
meanings.sent1: The reauthorizations for the event permits needed to be submitted well in advance.
meanings.sent2: The company's reauthorizations for product distribution were handled by the legal team.
meanings.sent3: The reauthorizations for pet adoption made sure the furry friends found loving homes.
meanings.sent4: The reauthorizations for the annual subscriptions felt like hitting the refresh button on entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The reauthorizations for the parking passes were essential for smooth access to the building.
